sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useContext } from "react"; import { ShopContext } from "../../context/shop-context"; import "./checkout.css"; import { CartItem } from "../cart/cart-item"; export const Checkout = () => { const [products, setProducts] = React.useState([]); // Fetch api React.useEffect(() => { fetch("http://127.0.0.1:8000/api/v1/products/") .then((response) => response.json()) .then((data) => setProducts(data)); }, []); const { cartItems, getTotalCartAmount } = useContext(ShopContext); console.log(cartItems); const totalAmount = getTotalCartAmount(); const [pickUpOption, setPickUpOption] = useState(false); const handlePickUpOptionChange = (event) => { setPickUpOption(event.target.checked); }; const [tab, setTab] = useState(1); function handleTabChange(event) { setTab(Number(event.target.value)); } return (

Checkout Page

Cart Items

{products.map((product) => { if (cartItems[product.id] !== 0) { return ; } })}

Subtotal: ${totalAmount}

Customer Information

Shipping

Choose your payment method

Paypal

Safe payment online. Credit card needed. PayPal account is not necessary.

Credit Card

Safe money transfer using your bank account. Safe payment online. Credit card needed. Visa, Maestro, Discover, American Express

Credit Card Number
Expiry Date
CVV Code ?
Name on Card
Finish Order
); };
